titles.title: A resolution relative to the death of William F. Hildenbrand, former Secretary of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
7/21/2011--Passed Senate without amendment. Declares that the Senate has heard with profound sorrow and deep regret the announcement of the death of William F. Hildenbrand.
Declares that when the Senate adjourns on July 21, 2011, it stand adjourned as a further mark of respect to the memory of William F. Hildenbrand.
